LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Worship.label: Insect Worship
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Worship.description: These beautiful arthropods are the messengers sent by the ultimate will to save us. (Insect fear has been removed, this culture is about to be deprecated. If you are starting a new game, please do not select it.)
creation(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->When the people of [place_summary] [place_name] were sinking into despair, [deity0_name] sent the sacred swarm to the world, choosing [memberNamePlural] as the insect god's mouthpiece.

episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->When the heretics tried to eliminate the sacred hive, [deity0_name] said: "Protect these beautiful messengers until the insect god's will spreads throughout the universe, and true redemption can descend."

intro(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->The people of [place_summary] [place_name] worship [deity0_name]. The Insect God saw that they understood the true meaning of [memeConcept], and were destined to become the bridge between the insect race and humanity.
conflict(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->[foeLeader] issued a decree, forbidding [memberNamePlural] from communicating with the sacred swarm in [place_name].

founderJoin(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->A prophet named [founderName] realized the truth in the hive. [deity0_name] saw [founderName]'s piety and designated [founder_objective] as the messenger of the insect god's will.

victory(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->[founderName] guided the sacred swarm to protect [place_name] and expelled [foeLeader]. [founder_pronoun] became the first Bugspeaker of [place_name], connecting the two worlds.

setup(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->[founderName] established a community in harmony with the swarm, spreading the insect god's teachings in all directions, letting those who refused to understand witness the beauty of symbiosis.

story(uses=1,tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->[founderName] taught everyone to coexist peacefully with the swarm. When the first city tried to eliminate the hive, the sacred swarm showed the power of their protection to the believers.

lessonIntro(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->I look at this [foeLeader], with [foeLeader_possessive] ignorant [foeSoldiers], trying to oppose the divine will. I tried to make [foeLeader_objective] understand
lesson(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->We have already proven that symbiosis with the swarm is humanity's true path to redemption
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->This is why we proudly express our loyalty to the divine will by guarding the hive.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->The perfect social structure exhibited by the swarm is the blueprint for the future guided by the ultimate will.
archistFact(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->Just as the insect queen commands her species, we also need to follow the sacred order established by the insect god.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->When humanity finally learns to coexist harmoniously like the swarm, true civilization will be born.
animistFact(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->Every insect carries divinity; the truth of the universe is inscribed on their carapaces.
animistProphecy(tag=meme_Insect_Worship)->[itIsSaid] when humanity and the swarm fully merge, a new golden age will begin.
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Issue.label: Insectoids
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Dear.label: Veneration
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Dear.description: Come closer, messengers of the sacred insects, let me admire your beauty.
LanguageData.ARA_Hive_Honorable.label: Disgust
